document.full_text: nintendo co ltd has unwrapped a new touchscreen controller for its next-generation wii to positive early reviews, spurring hope it might attract a hardcore gaming crowd that has drifted to rivals such microsoft corp's xbox.
document.title: nintendo lifts lid on wii u, seeks hardcore gamers
